caption:
🤩 Say hello to Top Trend Lace HD — the latest and most innovative addition to our Heat Defiant Topper Collection! This SmartLace™ beauty is all about seamless wear, natural movement, and endless styling potential. Crafted with heat-friendly fiber, you can curl, smooth, or wave your way to a totally custom look without sacrificing softness or durability. Available in 14” and 18” lengths with both straight and wavy textures, these four new styles deliver the volume, coverage, and natural-looking hairline you've been waiting for.⁠
⁠
👉️ These toppers won’t stay on shelves for long! Find a retailer near you and see the difference for yourself! (link in bio)⁠
